description:
Jang The Great Prince, after regressing due to the destruction of the world, decides to not help mankind with stopping the world’s destruction and tries to run away to live a peaceful life.

“I can’t, I can’t not give up, I have to give up. If you have to save humanity, go ask other people. There are many people better than me. I am not the guy for this!”>
